description: 859 Other Business Services not Elsewhere Specified
extraDescription: Consultant Services: The work will have two separate elements that can be done simultaneously. The first section will comprise of running up to three competitive processes to develop pools of qualified employees at the PM 03, PM 04, PM 5 or PM 6 levels for Canada Pension Plan (CPP) and Old Age Security (OAS). The second element will include the development of standardised Statement of Merits for levels ranging from PM 02 to PM 06, AS 01 to AS 05, and EC 02 to EC 7 which will include streams to represent various types of positions within the Directorate.
